name: libxrender
description: libXrender - library for the Render Extension to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: libx11
dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.

dependencies.name: renderproto
dependencies.description:
X Rendering Extension. This extension defines the protcol for a digital
image composition as the foundation of a new rendering model within the
X Window System.

dependencies.name: pkgconfig
dependencies.description:
pkg-config is a helper tool used when compiling applications and
libraries

dependencies.name: util-macros
dependencies.description:
This is a set of autoconf macros used by the configure.ac scripts in
other Xorg modular packages, and is needed to generate new versions of
their configure scripts with autoconf.

dependent_to.name: xclock
dependent_to.description:
xclock is the classic X Window System clock utility. It displays the
time in analog or digital form, continuously updated at a frequency
which may be specified by the user.

dependent_to.name: libxcursor
dependent_to.description: libXcursor - X Window System Cursor management library.

dependent_to.name: xfd
dependent_to.description:
xfd - display all the characters in a font using either the X11 core
protocol or libXft2.

dependent_to.name: x11perf
dependent_to.description: Simple X server performance benchmarker.

dependent_to.name: cairo
dependent_to.description: Cairo is a 2D graphics library with support for multiple output devices.

dependent_to.name: qt
dependent_to.description: Qt is a comprehensive cross-platform C++ application framework.

dependent_to.name: xcompmgr
dependent_to.description:
xcompmgr is a sample compositing manager for X servers supporting the
XFIXES, DAMAGE, RENDER, and COMPOSITE extensions. It enables basic eye-
candy effects.

dependent_to.name: gaussian-view
dependent_to.description:
GaussView 6 is the latest iteration of a graphical interface used with
Gaussian. It aids in the creation of Gaussian input files, enables the
user to run Gaussian calculations from a graphical interface without the
need for using a command line instruction, and helps in the
interpretation of Gaussian output. Needs post-install steps to make it
run! See package installation logs for details.

dependent_to.name: scantailor
dependent_to.description:
Scan Tailor is an interactive post-processing tool for scanned pages. It
performs operations such as page splitting, deskewing, adding/removing
borders, and others. You give it raw scans, and you get pages ready to
be printed or assembled into a PDF or DJVU file. Scanning, optical
character recognition, and assembling multi-page documents are out of
scope of this project.

dependent_to.name: icedtea
dependent_to.description:
The IcedTea project provides a harness to build the source code from
http://openjdk.java.net using Free Software build tools and adds a
number of key features to the upstream OpenJDK codebase. IcedTea
requires an existing IcedTea or OpenJDK install to build.

dependent_to.name: dia
dependent_to.description: Dia is a program for drawing structured diagrams.

dependent_to.name: libxft
dependent_to.description:
X FreeType library. Xft version 2.1 was the first stand alone release of
Xft, a library that connects X applications with the FreeType font
rasterization library. Xft uses fontconfig to locate fonts so it has no
configuration files.

dependent_to.name: libxrandr
dependent_to.description: libXrandr - X Resize, Rotate and Reflection extension library.

dependent_to.name: xlogo
dependent_to.description: The xlogo program simply displays the X Window System logo.

dependent_to.name: compiz
dependent_to.description:
compiz - OpenGL window and compositing manager. Compiz is an OpenGL
compositing manager that use GLX_EXT_texture_from_pixmap for binding
redirected top-level windows to texture objects. It has a flexible plug-
in system and it is designed to run well on most graphics hardware.

dependent_to.name: rendercheck
dependent_to.description:
rendercheck is a program to test a Render extension implementation
against separate calculations of expected output.

dependent_to.name: fluxbox
dependent_to.description:
Fluxbox is a windowmanager for X that was based on the Blackbox 0.61.1
code. It is very light on resources and easy to handle but yet full of
features to make an easy, and extremely fast, desktop experience.

dependent_to.name: xrandr
dependent_to.description:
xrandr - primitive command line interface to X11 Resize, Rotate, and
Reflect (RandR) extension.

dependent_to.name: libcanberra
dependent_to.description:
libcanberra is an implementation of the XDG Sound Theme and Name
Specifications, for generating event sounds on free desktops, such as
GNOME.

dependent_to.name: xterm
dependent_to.description:
The xterm program is a terminal emulator for the X Window System. It
provides DEC VT102 and Tektronix 4014 compatible terminals for programs
that can't use the window system directly.

dependent_to.name: ngspice
dependent_to.description:
ngspice is the open source spice simulator for electric and electronic
circuits.

dependent_to.name: xeyes
dependent_to.description: xeyes - a follow the mouse X demo, using the X SHAPE extension

dependent_to.name: vizglow
dependent_to.description:
VizGlow software tool is used for high-fidelity multi-dimensional
modeling of non-equilibrium plasma discharges. Note: VizGlow is licensed
software. You will need to create an account on the EsgeeTech homepage
and download VizGlow yourself. Spack will search your current directory
for a file of this format. Alternatively, add this file to a mirror so
that Spack can find it. For instructions on how to set up a mirror, see
http://spack.readthedocs.io/en/latest/mirrors.html
